page.title: 17POEMS
page.content: { POEMS { CAR OF THE EIGHTIES BY BEN C My new Volvo 340 I think its great, Old cars I really hate!Its really bold and slick,The 5 gear speed box is really quick.The iluminous dials go green and white.The stereo is out of site,If I had an X-Ray eye I now what I would spy.A lot of protection tuned to perfection,In case of a crash its worth the cash. {SHOPPING IN THE 80's} Mum took me to town in her new Montego .We stopped at a petrol station with liquid crystal displays and free digital watches with 5 litres of oil. We then carried on to the pay and display car park behind Asda where we parked next to a C5.We got our trolley and I went to the clothes department while mum went to the the supermarket part.I selected some Jelly Bean shoes,
